sourcesContent: import React,{useCallback,useMemo}from"react";import{SELECT_TAB}from"../../actions";import{useStore}from"../../hooks";import TabItem from"./TabItem";import{AVAILABLE_TABS}from"./Tabs.constants";import{StyledTabs}from"./Tabs.styled";var Tabs=function(){var a=useStore(),b=a.t,c=a.dispatch,d=a.tabId,e=void 0===d?null:d,f=a.config,g=f.tabsIds,h=f.defaultTabId,i=f.useCloudimage,j=useMemo(function(){var a=[];return 0<Object.keys(g).length?AVAILABLE_TABS.forEach(function(b){var c=g.indexOf(b.id);-1!==c&&(a[c]=b)}):a=AVAILABLE_TABS,(0<a.length?a:AVAILABLE_TABS).filter(function(a){var b=a.hideFn;return!b||!b({useCloudimage:i})})},[g]),k=useCallback(function(a){c({type:SELECT_TAB,payload:{tabId:a}})},[]);return 1===j.length?null:React.createElement(StyledTabs,{className:"FIE_tabs"},j.map(function(a){var c=a.id,d=a.labelKey,f=a.icon;return React.createElement(TabItem,{key:c,id:c,label:b(d),Icon:f,isSelected:(e||h)===c,onClick:k})}))};export default Tabs;
